03 - Volcoross (Heroic)

Oct 27, 2023

Back to Amirdrasil Bosses

TLDR:

Everyone

  • todo

Healers

  • Todo

Tanks

  • todo

Notes:

  • Split into two groups

  • At 100% Energy, Volcoross will cast Flood of the Firelands

    • Soak Flood of the Firelands with at least 4 Players

  • Don’t stand in Hellboil

    Did you really need a pic of this one???

  • Heal Serpent’s fury

    • Take Coiling Flames out of raid and spot Heal
    • When Coiling Flames expires, it will jump to another player

  • Heal Twisted singe

  • Dodge Scorchtail crash and Tidal Blaze

  • Dodge swirlies from Volcanic Disgorge

  • Tank damage from Molten Venom stacks

  • Taunt swap just before on Cataclysm Jaws

    • So the tank with Molten Venom stacks doesnt get clapped

  • Heal Burning Vertebrate
